TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SecurityContext extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class SecurityContext Implements IDisposable
public ref class SecurityContext sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: Encapsulates and propagates all security-related data for execution contexts transferred across threads.

span.span: Encapsulates and propagates all security-related data for execution contexts transferred across threads.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象将捕获所有与安全相关的信息，对于逻辑线程，包括中包含的信息和对象。A object captures all security-related information for a logical thread, including the information contained in the and objects. 此配置允许 Windows 标识和安全元素时自动传播到堆栈上复制并在异步线程间传输。This configuration allows the Windows identity and the security elements on the stack to be propagated automatically when the is copied and transferred across asynchronous threads. > [!NOTE] > 公共语言运行时 (CLR) 可的模拟使用托管的代码，不是模拟平台通过如执行托管代码的外部执行的操作调用到非托管代码或通过直接调用 Win32 函数察觉。The common language runtime (CLR) is aware of impersonation operations performed using only managed code, not of impersonation performed outside of managed code, such as through platform invoke to unmanaged code or through direct calls to Win32 functions. 仅托管对象可以流经异步点，除非`alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy`元素设置为`true`(``)。Only managed objects can flow across asynchronous points, unless the `alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy` element has been set to `true` (``). 设置`alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy`元素`true`指定的 Windows 标识始终流经异步点，而不考虑执行模拟的方式。Setting the `alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy` element to `true` specifies that the Windows identity always flows across asynchronous points, regardless of how impersonation was performed. 有关详细信息流动非托管模拟流经异步点，请参阅[ <alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/alwaysflowimpersonationpolicy-element.md)。For more information about flowing unmanaged impersonation across asynchronous points, see [<alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/alwaysflowimpersonationpolicy-element.md). 是将较大的一部分和流或迁移时流动或迁移。The is part of the larger and flows or migrates when the flows or migrates. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用对象实现 IDisposable"一节接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 捕获的安全上下文可以应用于另一个线程。The captured security context can be applied to another thread. 组成和正在执行的线程。The consists of the and the for the executing thread.

span.span: Creates a copy of the current security context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须通过捕获或复制操作获得当前的上下文。The current context must have been acquired through a capture or a copy operation. 此方法可用于将应用捕获到多个线程。This method is useful for applying a captured to multiple threads.

exception.span: The current security context has been previously used, was marshaled across application domains, or was not acquired through the method.

span.span: The current security context has been previously used, was marshaled across application domains, or was not acquired through the method.

abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用完成时，当前线程的安全上下文被返回到其以前的状态。The security context for the current thread is returned to its previous state when the method call is complete. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来指定的安全上下文中执行的方法。The following code example shows how to use the method to execute a method in a specified security context. MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl SuppressFlow() cil managed
Public Shared Function SuppressFlow () As AsyncFlowControl

summary.span: Suppresses the flow of the security context across asynchronous threads.

span.span: Suppresses the flow of the security context across asynchronous threads.

returns.span: An structure for restoring the flow.

span.span: An structure for restoring the flow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可取消的流异步操作在当前线程上的信息。Use this method to suppress the flow of information on the current thread for asynchronous operations. 公共语言运行时 (CLR) 才知道使用托管的代码执行的模拟操作。The common language runtime (CLR) is only aware of the impersonation operations performed using managed code. CLR 具有托管代码的外部执行的模拟不了解，如平台调用到非托管代码执行模拟，或通过调用 Win32 函数。The CLR has no knowledge of impersonation performed outside of managed code, such as platform invokes to unmanaged code that does the impersonation, or through calls to Win32 functions. 标识异步点，必须使用托管流过和方法。To flow identity across asynchronous points you must use the managed and methods. 使用方法返回结构，以返回到其以前的状态的对象。Use the method on the returned structure to return the object to its previous state. 此方法受到为权限。This method is protected with a for permission. 完全受信任的组件可以调用此方法来禁止显示的流异步调用过程中的信息。A fully trusted component can call this method to suppress the flow of the information during asynchronous calls. 当取消流动时，方法将返回`null`。When the flow is suppressed, the method returns `null`.

permission.span: 直接调用方需要完全信任。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 不能由部分受信任的或透明的代码使用此成员。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可取消的 Windows 标识流时在异步线程间迁移。Use this method to suppress the flow of the Windows identity when the migrates across asynchronous threads. 使用方法返回结构，以返回到其以前的状态的对象。Use the method on the returned structure to return the object to its previous state. > [!NOTE] > 公共语言运行时 (CLR) 可的模拟使用托管的代码，不是模拟平台通过如执行托管代码的外部执行的操作调用到非托管代码或通过直接调用 Win32 函数察觉。The common language runtime (CLR) is aware of impersonation operations performed using only managed code, not of impersonation performed outside of managed code, such as through platform invoke to unmanaged code or through direct calls to Win32 functions. 仅托管对象可以流经异步点，除非`alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy`元素设置为`true`(``)。Only managed objects can flow across asynchronous points, unless the `alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy` element has been set to `true` (``). 设置`alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy`元素`true`指定的 Windows 标识始终流经异步点，而不考虑执行模拟的方式。Setting the `alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy` element to `true` specifies that the Windows identity always flows across asynchronous points, regardless of how impersonation was performed. 有关详细信息流动非托管模拟流经异步点，请参阅[ \ 元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/alwaysflowimpersonationpolicy-element.md)。For more information about flowing unmanaged impersonation across asynchronous points, see [\ Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/alwaysflowimpersonationpolicy-element.md).
